DELETED: The Federation’s Mirages keep coming after this town. They won’t leave us alone. But whenever they show up, that’s when we step in.
I’ve never fought anything like those strange machines before. They’re so strong, and there’s so many of them...
This town may not last much longer...
Whew... We somehow managed to keep those machines at bay. But you know, I still wonder: just what the blazes [f2]were[/f] those things?
